text: {| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" width="300" style="margin-left:10px; margin-bottom:10px; class=wikitable |----- | align="center" colspan="2" bgcolor="#FFDF80" | former province of the Republic of China Liaopeh Province (1945-1948) |- | colspan="2" | 250px |- | Capital |Liaoyüan |} Liaobei (Wade- Giles: Liaopei) also known as Liaopeh was a province in Manchuria, in what is now the People's Republic of China. It mostly covered territory which is now in Inner Mongolia. The capital of Liaobei was Liaoyuan City (present-day Shuangliao, Jilin).双辽是两条辽河吗 ==References== ==See also== *Map showing the location of Liaobei within the claimed territories of the ROC Category:Provinces of the Republic of China (1912–1949) Category:Manchuria Category:Subdivisions of Manchukuo
title: Liaobei
